channel.title: Akkrean on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Akkrean on Chaotic Online

item.title: Legions of Aa'une (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues with overturns and some shifting… and the end!

item.title: Threshold of Destruction
item.description: In this episode, once Dranakis Threshold’s secret leaked out, several players ported to ancient Perim, including Chaotic’s “Bonnie & Clyde”, who didn’t take long in conspiring with an old acquaintance, making of a painful event become, potentially, irreversible.

item.title: Yesterday's Heroes
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Vlar, a thief renegade by the OverWorld Tribe of Ancient Perim which, possibly, is Maxxor ancestor
